page.title: Assessment Instructions
page.subtitle: Please review these guidelines before proceeding with your assessment

beforeYouBegin.title: Before You Begin
beforeYouBegin.content: This assessment will evaluate your organization's cloud native maturity across 8 categories. The questions are designed to gather information about your current practices, tools, and processes.

whoShouldComplete.title: Who Should Complete This
whoShouldComplete.content: For best results, this assessment should be completed by someone with broad knowledge of your organization's cloud native infrastructure, practices, and operations - typically a CTO, VP of Engineering, or Cloud Platform Lead.

timeCommitment.title: Time Commitment
timeCommitment.content: The assessment contains approximately 40 questions across 8 categories and takes about 15-20 minutes to complete. You can save your progress and return later if needed.

confidentiality.title: Confidentiality
confidentiality.content: Your responses are confidential and will only be used to generate your personalized maturity analysis and recommendations. We do not share your specific answers with any third parties.

answerGuidelines.title: Answer Guidelines
answerGuidelines.content: Be honest and objective in your responses. The assessment is not a test - it's designed to provide accurate insights about your current state and opportunities for improvement.
